name: react
title: React Support
description: Custom error handler that returns JSON-formatted errors for the API and passes through all paths not found to React's index.html

docIndex.description: The path to the main react html page we want to pass through to if express doesn"t handle it

jsonUrls.description: A list of regular expressions matching URLs that should return JSON errors
jsonUrls.default_help: a regex matching the system setting "apiUrlPrefix"

viewUrls.description: A list of regular expressions matching URLs that should return HTML errors

message404.description: The message to return on 404 errors

consoleLogErrors.description: Whether to console-log errors before returning
